events.message: I was involved in a car accident last night, and I am submitting a claim for the damages to my vehicle and any medical expenses.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision incident reported by the customer.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the case and assist the customer with next steps.
We have acknowledged receipt of your claim and assure you that it will be processed promptly to resolve your vehicle damage.
Please provide photos of the damaged car, police report, and repair estimates to continue the claim investigation process.
The customer submitted all requested documentation, including photos from the scene and the official accident report, today.
Our claims investigation department has started reviewing the submitted materials and verifying the details of the collision.
The investigation concluded that the other vehicle was at fault, and your claim is valid for damages sustained during the accident.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and medical bills has been proposed to you for your review and approval.
You responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed your satisfaction with the handling of your claim so far.
The claim has been formally approved by the insurance company, ensuring prompt processing of your benefit payment.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued and should reflect in your bank account within the next two business days.
Your claim file has been closed successfully after payment issuance, and we thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
